text: Ni (jwapochele soni toba) kwa awala watatu wana kulechedwaga (toba jao ngapocheledwa chitema) kwikanila ndema ja chaawanile chilambo mwachisapanguchilemu, ni wawanikwe soni mâ€™mitima mwao, ni wasimichisye yanti pangali kwakuntilila Allah ikaweje Kukwakwe pe. Kaneka ni jwakombolasyisye wanganyao kutenda toba kuti atende tobajo, chisimu Allah ni Jwakupochela nnope toba, Jwachanasa channope
